kpi.name: M5008C23

kpi_info.title: AVERAGE HSDPA PROCESSING SETS UTILIZATION RATIO
kpi_info.use: "The average HSDPA Processing Sets Utilization ratio over the whole measurement period duration, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period, summing all the samples and dividing by the number of samples for the measurement period duration. Retransmissions are included.Processing Set Utilization ratio is based on two conditions - Throughput Utilization and Number of Users. For the purpose of this counters in each sample both conditions need to be calculated and the one that is with bigger percentage should be used. Note: For Flexi HW Rel. 1 this counter shows 0. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples."

kpi.kpi_alias: AVERAGE HSDPA PROCESSING SETS UTILIZATION RATIO
